text:
Hey all,

We are looking to potentially contract a developer that has done prior data migrations from FileMaker to HubSpot - please respond to this thread with a short description of prior experience between the two softwares if interested.

Please DO NOT dm me directly.

Hi Logan, hope you are doing well. If you are still looking for a HubSpot developer, why don't you try our outsourcing services. At just $30 per hour you can have a pool of experts working as an extension of your team. Please let me know if this sounds interesting. Here is my company profile for your reference: <https://www.straightgrowth.com/>
